kDescription

Unlike other pan-Asia spaces such as the Home Square, this lounge is exclusive to users of the same region only. Here you can find users coming from the same region as you, and learn about special news for your own region!

Unlike other pan-Asia spaces such as the Home Square, this lounge is exclusive to users of the same region only. Here you can find users coming from the same region as you, and learn about special news for your own region!
ここはＨome SqaureなどのPan Asia Spaceと違い、各地域のユーザーしか入れないプレミアムラウンジです。自分と同じ地域のユーザーがここに集まることができ、それぞれ地域向けの独自情報も満載！
아시아 지역의 모든 플레이어가 모이는 홈 스퀘어와 달리, 국가별 유저들이 따로 모일 수 있는 프리미엄 라운지입니다. 같은 지역의 친구들과 만날 수 있고, 지역 전용의 정보들도 가득합니다!

Unlike other pan-Asia spaces such as the Home Square, this lounge is exclusive to users of the same region only. Here you can find users coming from the same region as you, and learn about special news for your own region!
這裡跟Home Sqaure等等的泛亞空間不同，是只能讓各地區用戶進入的特設大廳。您可以跟自己相同地區的用戶在此相聚，並且也有專為各地區提供的獨家情報！
